**4a.** 

```{r}
library(stats)
load("Angrist80_YOB_3039.Rda")
head(Angrist80_YOB_3039)

model <- lm(LWKLYWGE ~ EDUC + RACE + MARRIED + SMSA + NEWENG + MIDATL + ENOCENT + WNOCENT + SOATL + ESOCENT + WSOCENT + MT + factor(YOB), data = Angrist80_YOB_3039)
summary(model)
```

**4b.** 

```{r}
options(scipen = 100, digits = 4)
coef <- summary(model)$coefficients[2, 1]
stde <- round(summary(model)$coefficients[2, 2], digits = 4)
sprintf("The coefficient is %s and the standard error is %s", coef, stde)
```

**4c.** 

```{r}
confint(model, "EDUC", level = 0.95)
```
